text: Gaudenzio may refer to: *Basilica of San Gaudenzio *San Gaudenzio, Ivrea *Carlo Gaudenzio Madruzzo, Italian Catholic cardinal *Gaudenzio Bernasconi, Italian footballer *Gaudenzio Botti, Italian painter *Gaudenzio Ferrari, Italian painter *Gaudenzio Godioz, Italian skier *Gaudenzio Marconi, Italian photographer *Gaudenzio Meneghesso, Italian engineer
title: Gaudenzio
